body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky confectioner and grocer. Virginia native. Married to Susan Preston Gray. Father of Thrashly Benjamin (T.B.) Gray, William K. Gray, Alice Gray, Frances (Franklin) Gray, Preston Gray and Anna T. Gray. Confectioner in partnership with first Ben Cogar, then William George and finally James M. Todd. In 1865 ran for the House of Representatives but lost. Died May 30, 1885 in Woodford County.
